title: Did Donald Trump call the La Wash trick in "The Art of the Deal "?
subtitle: A passage allegedly taken from Donald Trump's 1987 book "The Art of the Deal" does not call for washing hands after using the bathroom as a "strong game."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Donald Trump called for the non-washing of hands after using the bathroom "a strong game" in his 1987 book the art of the deal.
